property.name: text
property.value:
This Ptera model serves as a sub workflow model for reading power consumptions from a URI for a building. From the initial state, we could configure to either transit into the ReadOnlineData process that reads power comsumptions from the URI, or ReadOfflineData process that reads from a file. If there is an IO reading exception, the ExceptionHandler process is activated, otherwise, the power consumption is then stored in an array of recent readings by the Shift state. The Shift process also computes the avarage of recent power consumptions. If the moving avarage is higher than some certain power consumption threshold, the process Count is activated that counts the number of times that average power consumptions higher are higher than the threshold. If the number of times that average power consumptions are higher than the threshold exceeds a certain value, the EmailAlert process is activated that sends emails to registered email addresses configured using the file pointed by mailConfigurationFile.
Author: Dai Bui

property.name: expression
property.value: "Building " + building + " power consumption is " + power + " kW"

entity.name: FileReader
entity.doc: Read an entire file and output as a string

property.name: _type
property.value: arrayType({SMTPHostName = string, SMTPUserName = string, password = string, SMTPPort = int, to = string})

property.name: expression
property.value: "Building " + building + " power consumption is " + power + " kW"

property.name: expression
property.value: "Exception happens when reading data for " + building
